user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
reflect_result:
By scrolling up on the current screen, I have revealed more product listings. This allows me to view additional items on the search results page for "Logitech G Pro." However, this action does not directly contribute to emptying the shopping cart or adding the desired product to the cart as requested.

To make progress towards completing the user request, I would need to either go to the shopping cart and empty it or click on the product listing for the "Logitech G PRO" mouse and add it to the cart. Then, I could proceed to checkout. This action of scrolling helps in revealing more options but does not fully address the user's request yet.
